# Byte-compiled / optimized / DLL files
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*.pyo
*.pyd

# C extensions
*.so

# Distribution / packaging
build/
dist/
*.egg-info/
*.egg
*.tar.gz

# Virtual environments
.env
.venv
venv/
ENV/
env/

# PyCharm project settings
.idea/
*.iml

# Jupyter Notebook
.ipynb_checkpoints

# Python debug files
*.pdb
*.pyc

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# Logs
*.log

# Others
*.sqlite
